title: Just what I needed!
comment: The app is the best Desktop notifier for Android at the moment. My favorite feature is the auto-Wifi switching. I don't like to keep my WiFi on (I don't like battery drain). When a notification is to be sent, this app automatically switches on WiFi for a second, sends the notification to desktop, and switches off the WiFi immediately! Just AWESOME! I just love the automation! Wish more apps do like this instead of wanting a continuous WiFi connection.
